author: dkulp
msg: Set version format and allow for "in jdk" versions of various things

author: mfreedman
msg: PORTLEPORTLETBRIDGE-149: Update comments in new examples replacing existing copyright statements with Apache standard reference + Jetty/Pluto fixes.
PORTLETBRIDGE-150: save/restore current ExternalContext response object before/after delegating the render in the ViewHandler.

author: shuston
msg: Change warning C4996 from level 1 to level 4. This is the "warning C4996: 'std::equal': Function call with parameters that may be unsafe" warning. The "safe" replacements are only available on Windows, so can't be portably used. If the conditions are violated run-time errors are thrown, so these aren't totally ignored. Changing them to level 4 makes it possible for someone to easily find them all in a build if desired.

author: bentmann
msg: o Decoupled tests from interaction with Unix shell variables
